meanings.definition: Of the greatest size or amount
meanings.sent1: The elephant was the umptiest animal at the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The cake had the umptiest layers I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The umptiest suitcase barely fit in the overhead compartment.
meanings.sent4: Her umptiest effort in the race earned her a gold medal.
meanings.sent5: The umptiest wave crashed against the shore, towering over the surfers.

meanings.sent1: He walked around with the umptiest attitude, thinking he was better than everyone else.
meanings.sent2: Her umptiest remarks offended many people at the party.
meanings.sent3: The umptiest peacock strutted around the garden, showing off its colorful feathers.
meanings.sent4: The umptiest student in class always bragged about his grades.
meanings.sent5: The umptiest celebrity acted as if the world revolved around them.

meanings.sent1: She umptiest tried to finish the marathon despite her exhaustion.
meanings.sent2: He umptiest believed in the power of positive thinking.
meanings.sent3: The chef umptiest seasoned the dish with exotic spices.
meanings.sent4: The singer umptiest reached the high notes effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The detective umptiest searched for clues to solve the mystery.
